author: kstam
msg: JUDDI-540 working on adding the examples to the bundle

author: hossman
msg: SOLR-4138: CurrencyField fields can now be used in a ValueSources. There is also a new currency(field,[CODE]) function (merge r1452483 and r1452508)

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-1267. Java: Permit dashes in IDL property names.

author: astitcher
msg: * To the code that extracts values from message properties
- Added the full set of comparison operators
- Implemented extended "is null" and "is not null" operators
that allow expressions as well as just identifiers.

author: astitcher
msg: - Added in amqp 1.0 support that uses a filter for the selector
- This change requires at least qpid-proton 0.4 (or a lot of warning
messages are produced by the broker)
